channel.title: Install java
channel.description: Hello everyone, I wanted to know if it was possible to install JAVA on WHONIX and how to open a file .JAR

item.title: Install java
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

you may install it using aptitude, like on any other debian based system, though keep in mind, Java is a MASSIVE security issue, together with Flash probably the biggest there is. I recommend maybe looking for alternatives.

Have a nice day,

Ego
